title: GT.Racing.2.The.Real.Car.Expirience v1.0.2[Android][ETGamezone]
description:
GT Racing 2: The Real Car Expirience v1.0.2[Android][ETGamezone]



Year: 2013 
Genre: Racing 
Developer: Gameloft 
Publisher: Gameloft 
Publication Type: license 
Language: English {Multi 12}
Language voice: English 


System Requirements: 

Operating System: Android 2.3 or higher 
Processor: 1 GHz 
RAM: 512 MB 
Graphics Card: PowerVR SGX540 or equivalent 

Description: 

GT Racing 2: The Real Car Experience - a realistic racing simulator, 
which enables you to drive the most prestigious cars in the world! 
Another free game from the popular series offers racing fans an 
unprecedented level of realism in driving both single and multiplayer.

LEADERSHIP: ONE OF THE BEST racing simulator MOBILE 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ No other racing game does not ask you this: 67 licensed cars and 13 
racing tracks, including real track Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A rich selection of cars from 30 manufacturers: Mercedes-Benz, Ferrari, 
Dodge, Nissan, Audi, Ford and many others. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You will be able to test their driving skills in the 1400 races, 
including classic racing duel race and the knockout matches. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 28 competitions every week: instructing and win a free car!

REALISM: Fabulous Lifelike simulation 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A new model of physics game achieves an incredible level of realism 
for the mobile platform. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In GT Racing 2 is not always sunshine: you have to race at different 
times of day and in different weather conditions. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4 viewing modes in the race, the detailed interior of the vehicle and 
the corresponding design of real prototypes! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Repair without delay and cost! Now you do not have to wait for the 
completion of repair or pay for it.

ATMOSPHERE: single and multiplayer races 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compete with your friends or other players from around the world. 
Set the world record in the multiplayer races! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create a team with other racers together to strive for the top racing career. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ For beginners, provided the simplified handling and braking. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Experienced drivers can completely customize the car by himself in his garage.

No other game will not be able to offer you a level of realism, as GTR2. 
Load it for free and enjoy the best racing simulator for mobile!
